articleCompleteInfo.priceName: US$ 56500. MSRP depends on country, taxes, accessories, etc.
engineAndTransmission.fuelSystemName: Injection. DFI® with 50mm throttle bodies (4) with dual injection ; Kawasaki Supercharger
engineAndTransmission.lubricationSystemN: Forced lubrication, wet sump with oil cooler
chassisSuspensionBrakesAndWheels.frameTy: Trellis, high-tensile steel with Swingarm Mounting Plate
chassisSuspensionBrakesAndWheels.frontBr: Double disc. Dual radial-mount, opposed 4-piston Brembo Stylema® calipers, dual semi-floating discs. ABS.
chassisSuspensionBrakesAndWheels.frontSu: 43 mm inverted fork with rebound and compression damping, spring preload adjustability and top-out springs
chassisSuspensionBrakesAndWheels.rearSus: Uni-Trak, Öhlins TTX36 gas-charged shock with piggyback reservoir, compression damping, rebound damping, preload adjustability and top-out spring
chassisSuspensionBrakesAndWheels.wheelsN: Cast aluminum wheels. Bridgestone Racing Battlax V01F Slick tyres.
physicalMeasuresAndCapacities.seatHeight: 831 mm (32.7 inches) If adjustable, lowest setting.
otherSpecifications.commentsName: Closed-course only hypersport. Carbon fiber aerodynamic devices. Bosch IMU with Kawasaki´s dynamic modeling software. Launch Control. Traction Control.
